verses.verse: And when the sabbath <WG4521> was past, <WG1230> Mary <WG3137> Magdalene, <WG3094> and Mary <WG3137> the mother of James, <WG2385> and Salome, <WG4539> had bought <WG59> sweet spices, <WG759> that they might come <WG2064> and anoint <WG218> him.
And very <WG3029> early <WG260> <WG4404> in the morning the first <WG3391> day of the week, <WG4521> they came <WG2064> to the sepulcher <WG3419> at the rising <WG393> of the sun. <WG2246>
And they said <WG3004> among <WG4314> themselves, <WG1438> Who <WG5101> shall roll <WG617> us away <WG617> the stone <WG3037> from the door <WG2374> of the sepulcher? <WG3419>
And when they looked, <WG308> they saw <WG2334> that the stone <WG3037> was rolled <WG617> away: <WG617> for it was very <WG4970> great. <WG3173>

And entering <WG1525> into <WG1519> the sepulcher, <WG3419> they saw <WG1492> a young <WG3495> man <WG3495> sitting <WG2521> on <WG1722> the right <WG1188> side, <WG1188> clothed <WG4016> in a long white <WG3022> garment; <WG4749> and they were affrighted. <WG1568>

And he said <WG3004> to them, Be not affrighted: <WG1568> You seek <WG2212> Jesus <WG2424> of Nazareth, <WG3478> which <WG3588> was crucified: <WG4717> he is risen; <WG1453> he is not here: <WG5602> behold <WG2396> the place <WG5117> where <WG3699> they laid <WG5087> him.

But go <WG5217> your way, tell <WG2036> his disciples <WG3101> and Peter <WG4074> that he goes <WG4254> before <WG4254> you into <WG1519> Galilee: <WG1056> there <WG1563> shall you see <WG3700> him, as he said <WG2036> to you.

And they went <WG1831> out quickly, <WG5035> and fled <WG5343> from the sepulcher; <WG3419> for they trembled <WG2192> <WG5156> and were amazed: <WG1611> neither <WG2532> <WG3762> said <WG2036> they any <WG3762> thing to any <WG3762> man; <WG3762> for they were afraid. <WG5399>

Now <WG1161> when Jesus was risen <WG450> early <WG260> <WG4404> the first <WG4413> day of the week, <WG4521> he appeared <WG5316> first <WG4412> to Mary <WG3137> Magdalene, <WG3094> out of whom <WG3739> he had cast <WG1544> seven <WG2033> devils. <WG1140>
And she went <WG4198> and told <WG518> them that had been <WG1096> with him, as they mourned <WG3996> and wept. <WG2799>
And they, when they had heard <WG191> that he was alive, <WG2198> and had been seen <WG2300> of her, believed <WG569> not.
After <WG3326> that he appeared <WG5319> in another <WG2087> form <WG3444> to two <WG1417> of them, as they walked, <WG4043> and went <WG4198> into <WG1519> the country. <WG68>
And they went <WG565> and told <WG518> it to the residue: <WG3062> neither <WG3761> believed <WG4100> they them.

Afterward <WG5305> he appeared <WG5319> to the eleven <WG1733> as they sat <WG345> at <WG345> meat, and upbraided <WG3679> them with their unbelief <WG570> and hardness <WG4641> of heart, <WG4641> because <WG3754> they believed <WG4100> not them which had seen <WG2300> him after he was risen. <WG1453>
And he said <WG2036> to them, Go <WG4198> you into <WG1519> all <WG537> the world, <WG2889> and preach <WG2784> the gospel <WG2098> to every <WG3956> creature. <WG2937>
He that believes <WG4100> and is baptized <WG907> shall be saved; <WG4982> but he that believes <WG569> not shall be damned. <WG2632>

And these <WG5023> signs <WG4592> shall follow <WG3877> them that believe; <WG4100> In my name <WG3686> shall they cast <WG1544> out devils; <WG1140> they shall speak <WG2980> with new <WG2537> tongues; <WG1100>

They shall take <WG142> up serpents; <WG3789> and if <WG2579> they drink <WG4095> any <WG5100> deadly <WG2286> thing, it shall not hurt <WG984> them; they shall lay <WG2007> hands <WG5495> on <WG1909> the sick, <WG732> and they shall recover. <WG2192> <WG2573>

So <WG3303> then <WG3767> after <WG3326> the Lord <WG2962> had spoken <WG2980> to them, he was received <WG353> up into <WG1519> heaven, <WG3772> and sat <WG2523> on <WG1537> the right <WG1188> hand of God. <WG2316>

And they went <WG1831> forth, <WG1831> and preached <WG2784> every <WG3837> where, <WG3837> the Lord <WG2962> working <WG4903> with them, and confirming <WG950> the word <WG3056> with signs <WG4592> following. <WG1872> Amen. <WG281>
